Eq_solve¶

pleiades.eq_solve.compute_equilibrium(R, Z, Pfunc, psi_vac, g_psi, tol=1e-10, maxiter=100, relax=0.0, plas_clip=None, plotit=False)[source]¶

Compute jxB=gradP equilibrium for given P as function of R

pleiades.eq_solve.mirror_equilibrium(brb, gplas, p0, alpha1, alpha2, tol=1e-10, maxiter=100, relax=0.0, plotit=False)[source]¶

Compute jxB=gradP equilibrium for given P as function of psi/psi_lim given by P(psi) = p0*(1-(psi/psi_lim)**alpha1)**alpha2
